nodes.title: Add quotes to distinguish String default values
Add suggested workflows from cwl/workflows repository
Remove hash from start of IDs to support draft-2 ID/source notation
Add AJAX loading for research object bundle download
Add persistent workflow pages using MongoDB
Display Github link and when the workflow was downloaded
Convert footer to use bootstrap styling
Prevent IndexOutOfBoundsException when no workflow exists
Styling changes for uniformity with commonwl.org
Change to basic authentication for Github API
Create my own CWLUtil class to manage common workflow lang parsing
stop double testing PRs with Travis
Dockerfile: add extra libraries, unpin ruamel
Use Python3, also (for some reason) include nodejs
Can't use class "label" as it conflicts with bootstrap
UI: Shrink workflow doc and in/step/out doc
Fixes f.txt downloads for RDF formats
Fix for invalid branch names being accepted in some circumstances
Ensure asynchronous cwltool is on same git checkout
Consistent RDF permalinks with content negotiation
Ensure error stream is complete before reading error message
Ensure generic git handling of github.com gitlab.com URIs
Fix for the image in twitter meta tags
Clarify lack of support for SSH
Fix for checkouts leaving repository in MERGING state
Schema.org parsing for author information in RO manifest
Optional: Git clones as async loading step
Ontology Information for File format fields
Fix null pointer on workflow removal
Fix for disconnected inputs where # notation is used
Add legend to explain colours in the graph
Force outputs to the bottom of graphs using invis edge
Remove negative margins on logo to improve fitment
Double line break in doc strings allows for a new paragraph in table
Change to footer to update year and correct typo
Parsing of `run` parameters and colouring/linking to nested workflows
Prevent steps being assumed default even when they have source
Allow the use of the dot character in workflow IDs
Support for xdot format download for workflows
Fix broken link to workflow page
Fix to support null path values
Add dropdown for png download option
Add hover and selection of graph elements
Correct external referencing of resources to use URI format in RO
Remove trailing slashes from submitted URLs
Allow URLs to particular files in a Github directory
Add workflow discovery based on indegree of run params
Delete GraphViz images from cache when deleting a workflow
Fix maximum width of image column on /workflows
Add extra properties to Research Object manifests
Parse DockerRequirement and add DockerHub link to page
Show info message in the case of an empty table
Add support for ArrayNode in/out representation
Fix for Github blog URL not being set causing NullPointerException
Add CWL header image and link to it internally
Use Yaml SafeConstructor to prevent serialization issues
codeql: git checkout HEAD^2 is no longer necessary
Add pull-right class to move/align div to the right
Add small space between buttons and element under it, and align right
Ignore the docker compose override file used for dev
Notes on running Mongo/Jena in Docker, and spring boot on host.
Schedule recurrent CWL Viewer maintained cron-job for purging of old queued workflows from database
#172 error messages should state version of cwltool being used
Fix replace non working deleteByRetrievedFrom function with working delete function
Separate workflow URL from repository URL in "retrieved from" column of workflows page
Fix Ambiguity in workflows page and README build instructions.
For issue #310: Change URL for port 8080
Update the data controller for the https://view.commonwl.org instance.
[SECURITY] Use HTTPS to resolve dependencies in Maven Build
